content: complimentary pattern bibbo cap design by mary pranica pattern no for use with 202355 woolstok north super bulky for use with woolstok north super bulky bibbo cap design by mary pranica description inspired by our beloved bibbo bear this wooly cap knit in woolstok north is so cozy no winter wind will send you into hibernation experience level gauge in stockinette st 9 sts and 15 row = 4 advanced beginner sizes finished measurements 19½ one circumference 9 brim unrolled height materials yarn needles 10mm 16 circular needle or size needed to woolstok north super bulky size 15 obtain gauge 100% fine highland wool 150g/107yds 1 hank 10mm double pointed needles or size needed size 15 to obtain gauge color shown no 4302 gravel road other tools stitch marker tapestry needle p 02 blue sky fibers notes change to double pointed needles when stitches no longer fit comfortably on circular needle step no 1 cap co 44 sts pm and join to work in the round being careful ears make 2 not to twist sts co 5 sts working back and forth in row cont as k follows round 1 next rnds repeat round 1 until piece meas 7 or to desired row 1 and all odd row ws p height k2 m1r k1 m1l k2 7 sts row 2 increase row crown shaping row 4 increase row k3 m1r k1 m1l k3 9 sts k4 m1r k1 m1l k4 11 sts *k9 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 40 sts row 6 increase row round 1 k3 ssk k1 k2tog k3 9 sts *k8 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 36 sts row 8 decrease row round 2 k2 ssk k1 k2tog k2 7 sts *k7 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 32 sts row 10 decrease row round 3 k1 ssk k1 k2tog k1 5 sts *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 28 sts row 12 decrease row round 4 bobble *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 24 sts round 5 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 20 sts round 6 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 16 sts round 7 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 12 sts round 8 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 8 sts round 9 cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread rem sts and pull to close step no 2 finishing weave in ends fold one ear in half lengthwise and sew to side of head placing top of ear approximately 1 5 from the top of hat attach rem ear in same manner block as desired step no 3 care hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store folded do not hang p 03 blue sky fibers abbreviations bobble bind off p purl circ circular pm place marker co cast on
